data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
GpsDrive uses a simple UDP protocol for reporting to and querying
    friendsd server. The friendsd servers track the position, speed,
    heading of people or vehicles and make them available for
    centralized display. Without this module only the GPSDrive
    application could interface with friendsd servers. With Net::Friends
    external applications can be written in perl to speak the simple
    protocol necessary to display data from and report to remote
    friendsd servers.
